title: Public transport for the ANZAC Day Shrine Dawn Service: Thursday 25 April 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for the ANZAC Day Shrine Dawn Service: Thursday 25 April 2024

Events > Culture

The 2024 ANZAC Day Dawn Service will be held from 6am to 6.30am on Thursday 25 April at the Shrine of Remembrance.

Some additional services will operate; however, passengers are advised to allow additional time to get to the Shrine Reserve.

 Metropolitan train

To supplement regular services, 15 additional services will operate to assist customers in attending the Shrine Dawn Service, with all services arriving at Flinders Street Station by 5.36am.

Additional metropolitan train services for the Dawn Service

Train stationFirst service departingArriving at Flinders Street Station
Alamein shuttle5.07am5.36am (connect to Belgrave service at Camberwell)
Belgrave to Box Hill3.57am(Bus replacements Camberwell to Box Hill)
Craigieburn4.38am5.20am
Cranbourne shuttle4.16am5.26am (connect to Pakenham service at Dandenong)
Frankston4.28am5.32am
Glen Waverley4.56am5.30am
Macleod4.59am5.31am
Lilydale Shuttle4.03am(connect to Belgrave service at Ringwood. Bus replacements Box Hill to Camberwell)
Pakenham4.07am5.26am
Sandringham4.49am5.19am
Mernda4.36am5.27am
Sunbury4.43am5.29am
Upfield4.46am5.20am
Werribee4.36am5.25am
Williamstown4.52am5.25am (connect to Werribee service at Newport)

Detailed disruption information will be provided closer to the day.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Additional trams will operate on all routes except for Routes 78, 79, 82 and City Circle trams (Route 35) to assist customers attending the Dawn Service and arrive in the city by 5.30am.

Swanston Street Shuttles will operate on Swanston St/St Kilda Rd corridor from Flinders Lane towards Stop 20 ANZAC Station running every 3 minutes (approx.) until 5:32am.

Prior to the Dawn Service all trams travelling along St Kilda Road will terminate at Stop 20 ANZAC Station.

Please note: From 5:45am, no trams will operate along St Kilda Road between Stop 8 Melbourne Central Station and Stop 20 ANZAC Station.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
articleDescription: The 2024 ANZAC Day Dawn Service will be held from 6am to 6.30am on Thursday 25 April at the Shrine of Remembrance.
